components.data:
With remote: Press the Clock button. Press up or down to set hour, then press OK. Press up or down to set minute. Wait until H-SE appears on screen.

 

With on-light controls: Press knob in several times until H-SE appears on screen. Turn knob until Cloc appears on screen. Press knob in to select hour slot. Turn knob to set hour. Press knob in to select minute slot. Turn knob to set minute. Wait until H-SE appears on screen.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
With remote: Press the Clock button. Press up or down to set hour, then press OK. Press up or down to set minute. Wait until H-SE appears on screen.

 

With on-light controls: Press knob in several times until H-SE appears on screen. Turn knob until Cloc appears on screen. Press knob in to select hour slot. Turn knob to set hour. Press knob in to select minute slot. Turn knob to set minute. Wait until H-SE appears on screen.

components.data:
With remote: Press the menu button until H-SE appears. Press OK until Ch1 appears. Press up or down until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press OK until Ch2 appears. Press up or down until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press OK until H-SE appears. Wait until time is shown on screen.

 

With on-light controls: Press knob in several times until Ch1 appears on screen. Turn knob until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press knob in several times until Ch2 appears on screen. Turn knob until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press knob in several times until H-SE appears. Wait until time is shown on screen.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
With remote: Press the menu button until H-SE appears. Press OK until Ch1 appears. Press up or down until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press OK until Ch2 appears. Press up or down until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press OK until H-SE appears. Wait until time is shown on screen.

 

With on-light controls: Press knob in several times until Ch1 appears on screen. Turn knob until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press knob in several times until Ch2 appears on screen. Turn knob until desired light intensity is achieved (0-100%). Press knob in several times until H-SE appears. Wait until time is shown on screen.

components.data:
With remote: Press C1 On button. Press up or down to select hout slot. Set hour time. Press OK to select minute slot. Set minute time. Wait until H-SE appears on screen. Repeat for C1 Off, C2 On, C2 Off.

 

With on-light controls: Press knob in several times until H-SE appears. Turn knob until C1 On appears. Press knob in to select hour slot. Turn knob to set hour. Press knob in to select minute slot. Turn knob to set minute. Wait until H-SE appears on screen. Repeat for C1 Off, C2 On, C2 Off.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
With remote: Press C1 On button. Press up or down to select hout slot. Set hour time. Press OK to select minute slot. Set minute time. Wait until H-SE appears on screen. Repeat for C1 Off, C2 On, C2 Off.

 

With on-light controls: Press knob in several times until H-SE appears. Turn knob until C1 On appears. Press knob in to select hour slot. Turn knob to set hour. Press knob in to select minute slot. Turn knob to set minute. Wait until H-SE appears on screen. Repeat for C1 Off, C2 On, C2 Off.

components.data:
With remote: Press power button

 

With on-light controls: Press in knob and hold for a few seconds. The word "on" or "off" will appear on screen. Release the knob.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:

With on-light controls: Press in knob and hold for a few seconds. The word "on" or "off" will appear on screen. Release the knob.
